question: 苗床
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>bed</kanji> just for <kanji>seedling</kanji>s is called a <vocabulary>nursery</vocabulary>. It's where all the little seedling grow before they're sold or replanted outside.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
